item.description:
Conscious Massage: The Art of Touch

Integrating, Bodywork, Breath and Movement into Your Everyday Life


with Jeff Levin



Jeff has been a pioneer and leading figure in the field of massage and bodywork both in the Boston area and at leading teaching centers including Interface, Rowe, and Omega. He brings a joy for massage and a healing presence to all he does.

Our meeting begins with a potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:30 pm with time for networking and getting to know one another more deeply.

The month's presentation is from 12:30 - 1:30 pm.

Please let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP

$10 meetup fee
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome them at the door
item.name: April Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
